Title: Relates to establishing extended producer responsibility for gas cylinders
Summary: Relates to establishing extended producer responsibility for gas cylinders; provides that no later than June 30, 2026 a producer shall submit a plan for the establishment of a collection program for gas cylinders; establishes the gas cylinder extended producer responsibility fund.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3419, amd §71-1701, En Con L; add §97-uuuu, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing extended producer responsibility for gas cylinders
